data.text: @joelcacooney @MrKenShabby Although, given how much younger all the characters were in the books, that's not that far off...
@MrKenShabby From Game of Thrones, Jeor Mormont (played by James Cosmo, b 1947) is the father of Jorah (played by Ian Glen, b 1961) https://t.co/dm5uJRUcut
@lucitelu @TheDaiLlew @MrKenShabby Mrs Robinson was 6 years older than Benjamin. She had Elaine when she was 8.
@Popfictional @TheDaiLlew @MrKenShabby My neighbour's the same. Her son and granddaughter - same age.

@Sperocaof @TheDaiLlew @MrKenShabby Oh, I have an aunt who was pregnant at the same time as her daughter. The resulting children - Uncle and niece - were in the same class at school. My cousin then went on to become a grandmother at 36, via her 14 year old son (her middle child). Peak Wales.

@Harry__Harlow @TheDaiLlew @MrKenShabby 7 actually. 17 in the soap-verse. It's a mix of Dawson casting (Helen Worth was 23 playing 16 initially) and Nicholls playing slightly older than her possible stage age

@Popfictional @TheDaiLlew @MrKenShabby Then again, my uncle George Peter  (actually, my dad's uncle - 18 year gap between him and my gran, 7 years between him and dad) married age 17, pres. to avoid Aunt Pauline from being sent to the Magdalenes. Still together. Now quite Roy and Renee-ish.

@Popfictional @TheDaiLlew @MrKenShabby or in Ireland.
Irish soaps from Glenroe to Redwater often have incredibly young parents. In Redwater, 70 year old Ian McElhinney played the great-grandad of a teenager, while Glenroe lampshaded that Mary McDermott seemed barely older than her daughter Biddy.
@TheDaiLlew @MrKenShabby You've forgotten Audrey gave birth to Gail when she was 11. https://t.co/5N9kFEaNYt
@MrKenShabby It's like the bit in Gremlins where Gizmo gets wet.
@TheDaiLlew @MrKenShabby None of these are unusual in the Valleys.
@TheDaiLlew @MrKenShabby Connery has previous at this sort of thing. He was only seven when he had Dustin Hoffman. https://t.co/AGE2sPLL4u

@MrKenShabby Prof Henry Jones fathered Henry Jr. when he was 11. Clara Thornhill gave birth to Roger Thornhill when she was 7. Grandpa Potts fathered Caracticus Potts when he was -1. https://t.co/mx33cZ9mdp
@MrKenShabby The arithmetic doesnt work with 1979 either.
